title: Create FO-02 agent definition
description:
Create src/mastra/agents/fo-02/ directory with agent definition:
- index.ts with fo02Agent using 'fo-02' version namespace
- Agent should use getModel() with KV-configured model
- Include createFO02Agent(implementation) factory function

Follow pattern from existing agents (fo-01, ap-01, cs-01).
acceptance_criteria: Agent definition compiles, follows existing patterns
